main event: A military object was sighted moving erratically in the Pacific Ocean on August 17, 1963.
interesting points: The object was sighted moving at 20 degrees above the horizon, then disappeared at 20 degrees below the horizon.
The object reappeared momentarily 15 minutes later.
The report suggests the object may have been a satellite in an unusual orbiting motion.
The sighting was reported by military sources.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
